name: BulkSendV2Batch_PutBulkSendBatchStatus
description: Updates the name of a bulk send batch.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

batchName.description:
The new name of the bulk send batch.

This property is required. The maximum length of the string is 500 characters.

$ul: **batchSize**: The number of of bulk envelopes submitted in the current batch
**envelopeIdOrTemplateId**: The ID of the draft envelope or template that was used to create the batch.
**authoritativeCopy**: When **true,** marks all of the documents in the envelope as authoritative copies.
**created**: The UTC DateTime when the workspace user authorization was created.
**sent**: The number of entries with a status of `sent`.
**envelopesUri**: The URI to get all envelopes sent in the batch.
**failed**: The number of envelopes that failed to process or send.
**mailingListId**: The ID of the mailing list used to create the batch.
**queued**: The number of envelopes waiting in pending queue
**sent**: The number of envelopes sent successfully.
**submittedDate**: The timestamp of  when the batch was submitted in ISO 8601 format.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
